mapper.select: select total_amount from biz_pay_order where order_status = 2

SELECT count(1) as orderCount, sum(item_piece) as pieceCount, sum(wait_time) as waitTime FROM biz_pay_order WHERE id != #{orderId} AND settle_time <= #{settleTime} AND TO_DAYS( settle_time ) = TO_DAYS( #{settleTime}) AND order_status = 2

SELECT t1.*, t2.address, t2.shop_name FROM biz_pay_order t1 LEFT JOIN biz_shop_info t2 ON t1.shop_id = t2.id WHERE user_id = #{id}
and order_status = #{status}
